author: jwoolley
msg: It's better to dup the apr_mmap_t when we first create it.  The result
is the same, and it saves us a call to apr_mmap_dup() per request.

author: brianp
msg: optimized away a strlen call in alias_matches()

author: brianp
msg: added inlined string concatenation to form_header_field() for speed

author: brianp
msg: minor performance fix for ap_add_common_vars(): replace printf with apr_itoa()
